form.label: Dome9 Alerts
form.description: Alerts generated by Dome9 for events in your AWS environment.

search.query: index=main sourcetype=aws-dome9 FriendlyType=Alert UserName="System" | rex field="message.Records{}.Sns.Message" "Description=(?<desc>[^,]+)" | rename desc AS "Description of Alert", comm AS "Comments for Alert" | table Severity, UserName, EventType, "Description of Alert" | sort +Severity

index=main sourcetype=aws-dome9 FriendlyType=Alert Username NOT "System" | rex field="message.Records{}.Sns.Message" "Description=(?<desc>[^,]+)" | rex field="message.Records{}.Sns.Message" "Comment=(?<comm>[^,]+)" | rename desc AS "Description of Alert", comm AS "Comments for Alert" | table Severity, UserName, EventType, "Comments for Alert", "Description of Alert", IPAddr | sort +Severity
